TopicTitle: How to roll back to 1.2.1 using Steam

Articles.Content: Title pretty much describes it. My steam client autoupdated ksp to 1.2.2, but I am getting impatient waiting for certain mods to be updated for 1.2.2, so can someone give me a brief rundown on how to get 1.2.1 back? I tried going under the steam properties and opting out of the auto updates and such, but this happened after the 1.2.2 update was already downloaded and installed. Thank you

You simply can't. They only offer the last stable major releases but not the point releases. That's why you should make backups of your game files or should even play from a separate copy of the game that Steam won't touch.
BTW, any mods that work with 1.2.1 NOT working with 1.2.2?
So far every mod I use at least has a compatibility patch (well, everything that's updated to 1.2 at all). What are you having trouble with?
Depending on mod I'm sure it's compatible (If you have Dmp for 1.2.2 it will not work as far as I know of.) Also I'm sure K.S.P. will tell you which is compatible and which is not.
